title: Flying Sparks
description: When Vicky becomes the target of a serial arsonist plaguing the city, Darien calls on the supernatural community to help. Pulling the creatures of the night together to cooperate on any project is troublesome at the best of times. The fact that the one responsible for the cityâ€™s woes is a being of fire and magic leads the reluctant groups to a truce that makes Vicky start to think that her job might be a bit more than one normal human can handle.This is the second book in The Ancient Fire SeriesThis is part two. The original book was divided due to length.This book has been rated using the Crimson Tree Publishing Disclosure System. All scores are out of 5. For more details please visit the their website. Violence - 5Language - 5Romance / Sensuality - 2Drugs / Alcohol - 1This Book Is Part Of A Series
author: Julie Wetzel
